庪字的基本解释

庪
guǐ
古同“庋”。
檐口檩条。

庪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guǐ］
［《廣韻》過委切，上紙，見。］
(1)屋檐口檩条。
(2)埋藏。
[②]［guì］
［《集韻》居僞切，去寘，見。］
同“庋2”。
擎；托。

庪字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　庪； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页346第13
【廣韻】過委切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】古委切，?音詭。【說文】?本字。　又【爾雅·釋天】祭山曰庪縣。【註】或庪或縣，置之于山。【疏】庪謂埋藏之。　又與攱通。【集韻】攱或作庪。

庪字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
庪字的起名意思

暂无。

Yu
Basic explanation of words
Yu
guǐ
Ancient Tong "Xu".
Cornice purlin.
Yu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guǐ］
["Guangyun" has been cut, put on paper, see you. ]
(1) The purlin of the eaves.
(2) Buried.
[②]［guì］
["Jiyun" is a pseudo-cut, go and set, see. ]
Same as "庋2".
Qing; support.
Yu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [Guang Zi Department] 　庪; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: page 346 13
[Guang Yun] Guo Weiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zheng Yun] Ancient Weiqie, sound tricky. 【Said Wen】? This word.　[Erya·Shitian] Worshiping the mountain is called Yuxian. [Note] Or Yu or County, put it in the mountains. [Sparse] Yu said it was buried.　It's also connected with me. [Ji Yun] 攱or Zuoyu.

Nothing.
guǐ
